name: Be Quiet!
detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

Sign up for the beta at https://beta.bequietgame.com/


Be Quiet! Web Management App

Get the Be Quiet! Web Management App to see your game stats or redeem vouchers with one click! Note: This is not the game itself.


About the Game

2007, your name is David and you woke up in the middle of nowhere, the only thing you can see in the forest is a house. Solve various puzzles to get to the next rooms and accomplish objectives! But watchout, you are not alone!

Features:

- Objective System
- Jump scares (of course)
- Story system
- Stealth system
- Multiple acts
- Restore power to hide from the darkness


Get a free key from https://bequietgame.com/ or sign up for the beta at https://beta.bequietgame.com/

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: Intel CPU with 4 Cores
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GPU, Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • OS: Debian, Ubuntu
